name: Ant Wars
overview: Earth was destroyed in a global cataclysm caused by the amoeba which had caused the earth to flip over on its acis and fly towards the sun causing a super-nova. Eddy Littler, a man of immense wealth, managed to escape in his private space ship. Consequently, so did a colony of ants living in Eddy's dreadlocks. More of a strategy game than its sequel, Ant Wars is a hybrid between Artillery games and Worms.
